snippet: The Professional Autograph Dealers Association’s annual show at the Lotos Club includes treasures like an ink portrait of Lincoln in his coffin and a check he wrote to his carpenter for work on an outhouse.
abstract: Professional Autograph Dealer's Association's annual show at the Lotos Club offers a glimpse into history for those with a more romantic perspective, and who view a signature as the marking of a moment in time, bearing the spirit of the signer; show includes an ink portrait of Abraham Lincoln in his coffin by Pierre Morrand, album pages signed by the Beatles, and many other artifacts.
lead_paragraph: The Professional Autograph Dealers Association’s annual show at the Lotos Club includes treasures like an ink portrait of Lincoln in his coffin and a check he wrote to his carpenter for work on an outhouse.

headline.seo: Autograph Dealers Association Show at Lotos Club
headline.main: Lincoln Scribbled Here: Strokes That Fascinate
headline.print_headline: Lincoln Scribbled Here: Strokes That Fascinate
